thread.title: PH Cup Finals: San Miguel, Ginebra engage in sibling rivalry
thread.title_full: PH Cup Finals: San Miguel, Ginebra engage in sibling rivalry

author: Rappler.com
title: PH Cup Finals: San Miguel, Ginebra engage in sibling rivalry
text:
PBA PH Cup Finals: San Miguel, Ginebra engage in sibling rivalry San Miguel Corp. sister teams San Miguel Beermen and Barangay Ginebra clash in the 2017 PBA Philippine Cup Finals Published 1:24 PM, February 24, 2017 Updated 1:24 PM, February 24, 2017 SIBLING RIVALRY. Sister teams San Miguel Beermen and Barangay Ginebra clash in the 2017 PBA Philippine Cup Finals. Photo from PBA Images 
MANILA, Philippines â€“ San Miguel Corp. sister teams San Miguel Beermen and Barangay Ginebra clash in the 2017 PBA Philippine Cup Finals. 
Game 1 of the best-of-7 series takes place Friday, February 24. 
The Beermen are trying to win their third consecutive all-Filipino crown while the Gin Kings are aiming for a quick follow-up to their 2016 Governors' Cup title 4 months ago. 
Tim Cone had earlier expressed he was happy Ginebra could avoid San Miguel in the playoffs but now, the top seed is the last team standing on his path to a 20th PBA title. 
Leo Austria, on the other hand, looks to maintain his unbeaten finals record so far in his coaching career. 
Check out some of the stats of both teams during each of their 7-game semifinals series.
